title: New statistics required - YEARS overdue rito!
body:
So I've been thinking this since like season 2 thought I might post it, 

at the end of every game, the most famed statistics are - damage dealt - damage dealt to champions - damage taken -
this is because these statistics are what labels one a "carry". At least, these statistics are important to me, as gold earned + damage dealt to champions can quickly indicate a person not doing what they can with the resources they have.

However, for supports, there has NEVER been a statistic beyond - healing done - to get a reading on how much they helped!
This doesn't just go for supports, even a tank like rammus should see something more than "oh look I took 50,000 damage I did good".
We need some stats showing;
CC landed
Damage prevented/shielded
Lives saved
and other utility based statistics for the ones left behind!

Hurry UUUUUUP riot I'm not even a support main and I think it's lame to not have real satisfaction for these types of champions!
